title: Shuffle Festival!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Hey hey heeey! Is everyone ready to shake up the place today~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Leave it to us! We’re all set!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>No no no, Kanata-senpai is still asleep, you know!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Kanata-san, please wake up.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Kanata-chan, the Shuffle Festival is about to start~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hnnh.... Ah! Uooooh! Kanata is ready to gooooo!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Kanata’s ability to raise her tension from 0 to 100 is really amazing....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I’d like to be able to raise my tension in an instant like that too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Maybe I should make.... a Rina-chan’s special tension burst machine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Everyone, let’s form a circle! Let’s make today’s stage one without regrets!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
